body:
Probably regression from my previous change. I will fix.

```
[ RUN      ] IpVersions/HttpTimeoutIntegrationTest.PerTryTimeoutWithoutGlobalTimeout/IPv4
TestRandomGenerator running with seed -292391128
[2020-08-14 16:12:53.930][141][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:104] Caught Segmentation fault, suspect faulting address 0x0
[2020-08-14 16:12:53.931][141][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:91] Backtrace (use tools/stack_decode.py to get line numbers):

[2020-08-14 16:12:53.931][141][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:96] #0: __restore_rt [0x7f0a01fa58a0]

test/integration/http_timeout_integration_test.cc:318: Failure
Expected equality of these values:
  "200"
    Which is: 0x3c8c5b
  response->headers().getStatusValue()
    Which is: "504"
```

title: HttpTimeoutIntegrationTest flake (x86 release)
